p:
Zooming out from the surge of interest in questions of transport and mobility justice, we can identify at least four tendencies and impulses in recent and current research on transport and mobility justice:1.
Theoretical development and diversification;2.
Enhancing the recognition of the needs, experiences, and understandings of everyday mobility;3.
Expanding the understanding of the causes of injustice in transport and mobilities; and4.
Development of new and different methodologies and methods for understanding and addressing in/justice in transport and mobilities.
